page.title: 16Chapel School sports day
page.content: Chapel Primary School has a sports day.Parents and friends come to see the children running.There are teams which are the colours of Red,Green and Yellow.Yellow have won for the last two years.Our coach as such is Miss Fields,who teaches the six and seven year old children.Her class is class two.On the day every child makes a rosette which he or she wears on the afternoon.They make them out of coloured paper.The colours are either Red, Green or Yellow.It turns out to be a great day and everybody enjoys the day out to see the children racing.
